title: Zustand State Management Setup
description:
Configure Zustand State Management Architecture

Set up Zustand stores to manage global application state, with a focus on user authentication and shared application context.

Requirements:
- Create a dedicated authentication store for user session management
  - Store current user data (profile, permissions, role)
  - Track authentication status (logged in, logged out, loading)
  - Include login/logout actions
  - Handle token storage and retrieval
  - Implement session persistence across page refreshes

- Create an application context store for shared UI state
  - Global loading states
  - Toast/notification messages
  - Modal/dialog state
  - Theme preferences
  - Feature flags or configuration settings

- Implement proper TypeScript types for all store states and actions

- Structure stores for scalability
  - Use slices pattern if store becomes large
  - Implement selectors for efficient re-renders
  - Add middleware for persistence (localStorage/sessionStorage) where appropriate
  - Consider devtools integration for debugging

- Ensure proper separation of concerns between stores

- Add basic error handling for state updates

- Document store usage patterns for team consistency
